name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 17, Shenzhen. A man lived in an underground passage with his breastfeeding baby in a tent. Local law enforcement officers persuaded him to go to the community to avoid the cold.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 18, Shenzhen, Guangdong. China Construction First Engineering Bureau owed workers wages, and two workers were forced to sit on the rooftop of the building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17, Hebei.
A woman defended her rights at Handan Postal Savings Bank, saying that she had borrowed 450,000 yuan from the bank, but the loan was withdrawn by someone she didn’t know. Now the interest has accumulated to more than 900,000 yuan. She was also sued by the bank and her house was sealed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, a chat screenshot in the "Caoguzhuang Information Group" attracted attention.
A staff member said, "If parents don't pay for medical insurance, how can children take the civil service exam and career appointment..."
When interviewed, the staff member said, "My WeChat is logged in on the village committee's computer and is public. Someone sent it using my WeChat, but I don't know who it is. The village committee didn't monitor it."
On the afternoon of the 17th, a staff member of the Nanchengsi Township People's Government told reporters that the publisher of the content in the above chat screenshot was an external accountant in Caoguzhuang Village.
"He also had good intentions, but he had not been trained and didn't understand it very well. We have already criticized and educated him."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 15, Qingdao, Shandong. A female high school student posted online that on the evening of December 9, her head teacher Zheng molested her during a dorm inspection after drinking. On the 16th, the girl posted an administrative penalty letter from the Jimo Branch of the Qingdao Public Security Bureau. The decision showed that Zheng's illegal behavior of molesting was established and decided to give Zheng administrative detention for 10 days. 
Later, the girl posted again that after the incident, she was absent-minded and confused for several days, and asked her family for help, but the school prevaricated her and her family and gave three reasons: First, it was afraid of delaying other students' college entrance examinations, and Zheng could not be expelled at present; second, it could not confess this matter to Zheng's wife, and the family was also an innocent party; the third reason was to take into account Zheng's social image. Once this matter was made public, what if he could not bear the pressure and committed suicide. 
On December 17, a reporter contacted the office of Qingdao Jimo District Experimental High School, and the staff said. It is true that Zheng molested a female student. Since the incident, the school has actively intervened, and the police and the Education Bureau have also intervened. The next step is for the Discipline Inspection Commission to intervene, and the school will punish the teacher in accordance with the law. 
That afternoon, the victimized female student posted a message saying that the school did not actively intervene, but the police intervened one day before the result. Previously, the school did not handle it a week after the incident, and kept evading the issue that we would handle it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A student from Xiaguan No. 3 Middle School in Dali City, Yunnan Province fell from a building. The school said that the surveillance camera was not used, which aroused the family's doubts. December 18, Yunnan. A mother posted a video saying that her daughter was 17 years old and was in the third year of high school at Xiaguan No. 3 Middle School in Dali City. She had excellent grades and had won the title of outstanding class cadre many times.
On December 8, the school organized students to visit Dali University. During the visit, because the daughter used a mobile phone to take pictures during the visit, the head teacher asked the daughter to write a self-criticism and invite her parents to come.
On December 9, the school said that the daughter cheated in the exam without any evidence and talked to her. After the daughter came out of the office, she was depressed and then jumped off the building and died.
After the incident, the family rushed to the school to ask to see the surveillance video of the falling place, but the school said that the surveillance camera could not be viewed because the wiring was not used. However, a student at the school revealed that the camera was usable and the surveillance camera here was adjusted a few weeks ago because of lost items.
On December 15, the family members and the school agreed to go to the Dali City Judicial Office for an interview, but the school staff asked them to wait for a long time. The family members were disappointed with the school's attitude. Now it has been 9 days since the daughter fell from the building. The mother was hospitalized due to excessive grief. Xiaguan No. 3 Middle School has not yet come forward to give an explanation, and the daughter is still lying in the funeral home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, a blogger posted on Weibo that he received a private message from a netizen, who said in the message that he was an older unmarried man who had been working hard since graduation, and that he had sued the court for a failed house purchase, and that his investment in p2p failed. He would kill children from excellent kindergartens indiscriminately to achieve physical equality for people. He also @ed Ping An Beijing.
So far, Ping An Beijing has not responded to this.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a 25-year-old young head teacher at Xiamen Technician College committed suicide by jumping off a building due to excessive pressure.
According to online news, in addition to the high-pressure and high-intensity work tasks that did not allow him to rest even when he was sick, he was also required to force students to sell insurance. At the same time, he was exhausted physically and mentally and had to pay attention to the mental health of students. In just two months, three students in his class attempted suicide, which had a serious impact on his body and mind.
In the group of head teachers in the department, he frankly said, "I am a joke" and "We buy insurance"
